com.tealium.library

Class RemoteCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tealium.library.RemoteCommand

  • public abstract class RemoteCommand
extends Object
    A RemoteCommand is a code block that can be invoked by Tealium's TagBridge. These RemoteCommands are added using Tealium.Config.addRemoteCommand(RemoteCommand) or Tealium.addRemoteCommand(RemoteCommand).
    Since:
    2014-09-30
    Version:
    4.1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RemoteCommand.Response
      This class allows a RemoteCommand respond to a TagBridge request.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteCommand

        public RemoteCommand(String commandId,
             String description)
        Remote command constructor. The command name-description pair are made visible in both Mobile Companion and in LogCat.
        Parameters:
        commandId - a URL domain name compliant command id to be called from TagBridge. This will be lower-cased.
        description - a brief explanation of the purpose behind the remote command to be viewed in LogCat and Mobile Companion.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - When commandId is null or commandId does not match the Regex "^[\w-]*$".

    • Method Detail

      • onInvoke

        protected abstract void onInvoke(RemoteCommand.Response remoteCommandResponse)
                          throws Throwable
        Execution block for the TagBridge command. This method will need to call RemoteCommand.Response.send() for the TealiumIQ callback can be invoked. If an exception is thrown inside of this implementation, the library will perform the callback, so please only call send() on completion.
        Parameters:
        remoteCommandResponse - a RemoteCommand.Response object. It's methods possess request arguments and response capabilities.
        Throws:
        Throwable - the library will call RemoteCommand.Response.send() with a status of 555 and provide a stack-trace as the body.
